biography: Jitendra Kumar is an Indian actor and his works include roles in popular comedy sketches from The Viral Fever such as Munna Jazbaati, Daaru pe Charcha, Tech Converstations with dad, etc. He is mostly known for playing the role of Jitu in TVF Pitchers, One of the most popular Indian Web series. He is also seen in the role of a Taxi Driver in the movie A Wednesday. He graduated with a Degree in Civil Engineering from IIT Kharagpur.
name: Jitendra Kumar
